mapper.insert: insert into permissions(name, moduleId, type, code, dataFields, remark, status, seq, operatorId, operatorName, operatorIp) values(#{name}, #{moduleId}, #{type}, #{code}, #{dataFields}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{seq}, #{operatorId}, #{operatorName}, #{operatorIp});
mapper.select: select permission.id, permission.name, permission.moduleId, permission.type, permission.code, permission.dataFields, permission.status, permission.seq, permission.remark, permission.operatorId, permission.operatorName, permission.operatorIp, permission.createdAt, permission.updatedAt, pm.name as moduleName from permissions permission left join permissionModules pm on permission.moduleId = pm.id where permission.id = #{id};

select permission.id, permission.name, permission.moduleId, permission.type, permission.code, permission.dataFields, permission.status, permission.seq, permission.remark, permission.operatorId, permission.operatorName, permission.operatorIp, permission.createdAt, permission.updatedAt, pm.name as moduleName from permissions permission left join permissionModules pm on permission.moduleId = pm.id where permission.moduleId = #{moduleId};

select permission.id, permission.name, permission.moduleId, permission.type, permission.code, permission.dataFields, permission.status, permission.seq, permission.remark, permission.operatorId, permission.operatorName, permission.operatorIp, permission.createdAt, permission.updatedAt, pm.name as moduleName from permissions permission left join permissionModules pm on permission.moduleId = pm.id order by permission.createdAt;

select permission.id, permission.name, permission.moduleId, permission.type, permission.code, permission.dataFields, permission.status, permission.seq, permission.remark, pm.name as moduleName, pm.parentId as moduleParentId from permissions permission left join permissionModules pm on permission.moduleId = pm.id where permission.status = #{status} order by permission.createdAt;
select * from permissions where name = #{name} or code = #{code} limit 0,1
